column5: Located near West Texas A&M University Campus and First United Event Center, Palo Duro Canyon, Texas Outdoor Theater in Palo Duro Canyon, Panhandle Plains Museum, Canyon Square, and Amarillo. Youâ€™ll love this place. It is located near I-27 for easy access to Amarillo. This haven, built in 2016, is beautifully decorated with modern design, open concept, and great kitchen. It's an incredible retreat for business travelers, families (with kids) and big groups. Go look at our impressive photos.
column8: Charming Newer Build, A Canyon Haven
